title: Lincoln's WARNING #100052: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Social Media Algorithm Changes? Man, I'm DEAD and I got more life than these politicians! They out here playing dress-up in suits, pocket full of lobby money, telling YOU to tighten your belt while their stomachs touching their KNEES! Bitcoin below. Social Media Algorithm Changes? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
